casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Erik Davon THOMPKINS, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 156724
COA: 339876 Supreme Court of Michigan. November 2, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendant-appellant to extend the time for filing his reply is GRANTED. The reply will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before December 3, 2018.
